messages.title: #greetingsname.given-name, I have a another customer who visited a restaurant and gave a 5stars rating.
messages.subtitle: The customer said, "This is a highly recommended restaurant. It has great food, one of the best. I will definitely come back." The customer gave 5 stars rating to the restaurant. How many stars will you give after reading this review? (1star= lousy, 5 stars=excellent) /1star  /2stars  /3stars  /4stars  /5stars

A customer said, "This is a highly recommended restaurant. It has great food, one of the best. I will definitely come back." The customer gave 5 stars rating to the restaurant. How many stars will you give after reading this review? (1star= lousy, 5 stars=excellent) /1star  /2stars  /3stars  /4stars  /5stars
